translation.hero.title: Full Stack Developer
translation.about.me: Hello! I'm Jasper Everett, a passionate Full Stack Developer with a knack for creating dynamic and responsive web applications. My journey in the world of coding began several years ago, and since then, I've honed my skills across a wide range of technologies, enabling me to bring innovative ideas to life on both the front-end and back-end. When I'm not immersed in code, you can find me exploring the great outdoors, playing guitar, or indulging in my love for cooking. I believe that a balanced life fuels creativity and productivity. Let's connect and create something amazing together!
